quests.name: The Restless Ghost
quests.description: A ghost is haunting [[Lumbridge]] graveyard. The priest of the Lumbridge church of [[Saradomin]] wants you to find out how to get rid of it.

requirements.label: Capable of killing or running away from a combat level 13 skeleton.

optionalRequirements.label: Fast travel to several locations
Wizard's Tower (1 trip) - Necklace of passage or Amulet of the eye or Amulet of glory to Draynor Village (All members only)
Father Urhney in the Lumbridge Swamp (1 trip) - Necklace of passage to Wizard's Tower or Amulet of glory to Draynor Village (Both members only)
Lumbridge (3 trips) - Lumbridge Teleport or Lumbridge Home Teleport (once)

quests.name: Ernest the Chicken
quests.description: Veronica is very worried. Her fianc√© went into the big spooky manor house to ask for directions. An hour later and he's still not out yet.

requirements.label: The ability to defend from a level 22 Skeleton.
Poison (obtainable during the quest)

optionalRequirements.label: (Members only) Fast travel to Draynor Manor (Draynor Manor Teleport or amulet of glory)
Food (If lower hp a lvl 22 skeleton and dead trees attack you)

quests.name: Imp Catcher
quests.description: The Wizard Grayzag has summoned hundreds of little imps. They have stolen a lot of things belonging to the Wizard Mizgog including his magic beads.

optionalRequirements.label: (Members only) Fast travel to the Wizards' Tower (necklace of passage, amulet of glory to Draynor Village, or Fairy Rings to )

quests.name: Vampyre Slayer
quests.description: The people of [[Draynor Village]] live in constant terror. Their numbers are dwindling, all due to the foul creature lurking in the manor to the north known as a vampyre.

requirements.label: Able to defeat a combat level 34 vampyre with a very high health recovery rate.
Hammer (can be bought from the general store just north of the Blue Moon Inn for 1 coin)
Beer (obtainable during the quest for 2 coins)
Stake (obtained during the quest)

optionalRequirements.label: Combat equipment - Magic is recommended if using the safespot
Fast travel to Varrock (such as the Varrock teleport)
(Members only) Fast travel to Draynor Village (amulet of glory or Draynor Manor Teleport)

quests.name: Prince Ali Rescue
quests.description: Prince Ali of Al Kharid has been kidnapped by the scheming Lady Keli. You are hired to stage a rescue mission.

requirements.label: The ability to get past aggressive combat level 26 jail guards.
3 balls of wool
Yellow dye or 2 onions and 5 coins
Rope (can be bought during the quest from Ned for 18 coins)
30-40 coins for the Al Kharid toll gate if not using teleports to and from Al Kharid

optionalRequirements.label: Fast travel to several locations:
(Members only) Al Kharid (2 trips) - Amulet of glory or ring of dueling
(Members only) Draynor Village (2 trips) - Amulet of glory or necklace of passage to Wizards' Tower
Quick access to a furnace:
(Members only) Amulet of glory to Edgeville
Lumbridge Teleport or Lumbridge Home Teleport

quests.name: Doric's Quest
quests.description: Doric the dwarf is happy to let you use his anvils but first he would like you to run an errand for him.

optionalRequirements.label: Pickaxe and   if you wish to mine the ores yourself (bronze pickaxe obtained during the quest)

quests.name: Witch's Potion
quests.description: Become one with your darker side. Tap into your hidden depths of magical potential by making a potion with the help of Hetty the Rimmington witch.

requirements.label: Burnt meat
Rat's tail (only obtainable after starting the quest)

optionalRequirements.label: Fast travel to Rimmington to start the quest - Teleport to House (the default house location is Rimmington) or Skills necklace to Crafting Guild

quests.name: Pirate's Treasure
quests.description: Redbeard Frank knows the location of pirate treasure, but he'll only part with the knowledge for a bottle of [[Karamjan rum]].

requirements.label: Able to defeat or run away from a Combat level 4 gardener.
Karamjan rum (obtainable during the quest for 30 coins)
White apron (obtainable during the quest in Port Sarim at Gerrant's Fishy Business.)
60 coins (only 30 are needed if using a Ring of charos(a))

optionalRequirements.label: Fast travel to several locations
Port Sarim to start the quest - Amulet of glory to Draynor Village or Explorer's ring 2-4 or Teleport to House (Rimmington) or Skills necklace to Crafting Guild
Varrock (1 trip) - Varrock Teleport or Chronicle or Ring of wealth or Skills necklace
Falador Park (1 trip) - Ring of wealth or Falador Teleport

quests.name: Witch's House
quests.description:
A young boy who lives in Taverley has kicked his ball into the garden of a scary old lady.

He asks you to get it back for him. This proves more difficult than it first sounds.

requirements.label: The ability to defeat 4 monsters from level 19 to 53 without a break.
Cheese (You may wish to bring several in case you mess up. One source is in Draynor Village - Aggie's house)

optionalRequirements.label: Weapon, armour and some food
4 free inventory slots

quests.name: Recipe for Disaster - Sir Amik Varze
Merlin's Crystal
quests.description: The wizard [[Merlin]] has been trapped in a magical crystal by the witch [[Morgan Le Faye]]. So far, King Arthur hasn't been able to figure out how to free his mentor from his crystal prison. Can you help?

requirements.label: Must be able to defeat a level 39 enemy.
You do not need to have an Attack level of 20 to free Merlin, you can 'Use' Excalibur on the crystal to free him.
Bucket of wax (obtainable during the quest with either the Beekeeper's outfit or insect repellent; a bucket spawns near the east gate of the beehive enclosure)

optionalRequirements.label: Stamina or energy potions
Fast travel to several locations
Camelot (Camelot teleport)
Falador (Falador teleport)
Varrock (Varrock teleport, Chronicle or combat bracelet to the Champions' Guild)
Taverley (Taverley teleport, Balloon Transport System or Teleport to House if your house is in Taverley)
Port Sarim (Explorer's Ring 2, Rat Pits or Pest Control minigame teleport, or Teleport to House if your house is in Rimmington)

quests.name: Monk's Friend
quests.description: A monk's child has had their blanket stolen. Find the thieves' den and return the blanket, then help Brother Omad organise the drinks for the child's birthday party.

requirements.label: The ability to run past two level 14 thieves, and one level 26.

optionalRequirements.label: Fast travel to Ardougne Monastery to start the quest - Ardougne cloak 1-4 or Ardougne Teleport or Spirit tree to Battlefield or fairy ring to  or Captain Barnaby's ship from Rimmington or Brimhaven

quests.name: Clock Tower
quests.description: Help the confused Brother Kojo find the missing cogs and fix his clock tower. Search the dungeon using brawn and brains to correctly place the four cogs.

requirements.label: The ability to run past level 53 Ogres
Alternatively, a Jug of water, Ice gloves, or Smiths gloves (i)

optionalRequirements.label: Weight-reducing clothing and stamina or energy potions
Fast travel to Ardougne to start the quest - Ardougne cloak 1-4 or Ardougne Teleport or Spirit tree to Battlefield or fairy ring to  or Captain Barnaby's ship from Rimmington or Brimhaven

quests.name: Tribal Totem
quests.description: Lord Handelmort of Ardougne is a collector of exotic artefacts. A recent addition to his private collection is a strange looking totem from Karamja. The Rantuki tribe are not happy about the recent disappearance of their totem.

optionalRequirements.label: Fast travel to Brimhaven to start the quest - Brimhaven teleport, Teleport to House (Brimhaven), 30 coins to travel from Ardougne docks using Captain Barnaby, or take a charter ship

30 coins to travel from Brimhaven docks with Captain Barnaby to Ardougne. This is the recommended route to Ardougne as you end up by the next part of the quest, but you can otherwise use an Ardougne Teleport

quests.name: The Knight's Sword
quests.description: Sir Vyvin's squire is in trouble. He has accidentally lost Sir Vyvin's ceremonial sword. Help him find a replacement without Sir Vyvin finding out.

requirements.label: The ability to run from level 57 ice warriors and level 53 ice giants could help.
Redberry pie (not half a redberry pie)
2 or 4 iron bars (4 if you want your own blurite sword)
1-3 Blurite ore (obtained during the quest) - optionally an additional ore each for your own blurite sword and the Falador easy diary (Members only)
Any pickaxe (one spawns in south Falador)

optionalRequirements.label: Armour and some food for aggressive enemies near the blurite rocks
Fast travel to several locations:
Falador to start the quest plus 2 additional trips - Falador Teleport, Ring of wealth (Members only)
Varrock (1 trip) - Varrock Teleport, Chronicle, Skills necklace to Cooks' Guild (Members only) or Ring of wealth to Grand Exchange (Members only)
Mudskipper Point (2 trips) - fairy ring  (Members only), Teleport to House (Rimmington) (Members only), Rat Pits minigame teleport (Members only), or Falador Teleport

quests.name: Tree Gnome Village
quests.description:
The tree gnomes are in trouble. General Khazard's forces are hunting them to extinction.

Find your way through the hedge maze to the gnomes secret treetop village.

Then help the gnomes fight Khazard and retrieve the orbs of protection.

requirements.label: The ability to defeat a level 112 Khazard warlord
6 normal logs (or an axe, obtainable during the quest by killing goblins in the Tree Gnome Village maze)
Combat equipment
Food

optionalRequirements.label: Weight-reducing clothing and stamina or energy potions
Fast travel to Tree Gnome Village to start the quest - Castle Wars minigame teleport, ring of dueling to Castle Wars, fairy ring to , Ardougne cloak 1-4, or necklace of passage to The Outpost

quests.name: Fight Arena
quests.description:
The prosperous Servil family have been abducted by the infamous General Khazard. He plans to have the family battle for his entertainment in the Fight Arena.

Can you rescue the Servils before the tyrant has these innocent (not to mention wealthy) civilians slain?

requirements.label: The ability to defeat level 44, 63 and 137 enemies (all can be safespotted)
5 coins (for Khali brew)

optionalRequirements.label: combat equipment and some food
Alternatively: Ranged, Magic or a Halberd to safespot all enemies (all enemies attack with melee)
Fast travel to Fight Arena to start the quest - Ardougne cloak 1-4 or fairy ring to  or Spirit tree to Battlefield or Ardougne Teleport or Captain Barnaby's ship from Rimmington or Brimhaven

quests.name: Hazeel Cult
quests.description: Discover the truth behind the Carnillean family fortune. Decide for yourself whether to aid the Carnilleans in retrieving stolen goods, or join the Hazeel cult members in their mission to resurrect the infamous Lord Hazeel.

requirements.label: Able to defeat a level 13 cultist (this applies only if you're taking Ceril's side)

optionalRequirements.label: Weight-reducing clothing and stamina or energy potions
Fast travel to Ardougne to start the quest - Ardougne cloak 1-4 or Ardougne Teleport or Spirit tree to Battlefield or fairy ring to  or Captain Barnaby's ship from Rimmington or Brimhaven

quests.name: Waterfall Quest
quests.description: Investigate the death of elven leaders of old. Search for the elf King Baxtorian's tomb and discover the mysterious hidden treasure of the waterfall.

requirements.label: The ability to withstand and evade attacks from level 86 Fire Giants and level 84 Moss Guardian without any equipment.

optionalRequirements.label: 8 or more Hitpoints (to run past enemies safely)
Food
Fast travel to several locations
Baxtorian Falls to start the quest, plus one additional trip - games necklace to Barbarian Outpost, Grouping teleport to Barbarian Assault, or skills necklace to Fishing Guild
Tree Gnome Village (1 trip) - Spirit tree, fairy ring , Ardougne cloak 1-4 to Ardougne Monastery, Grouping teleport to Fishing Trawler, or ring of dueling to Castle Wars
Glarial's Tomb (1 trip) - skills necklace to Fishing Guild, games necklace to Barbarian Outpost, or Grouping teleport to Barbarian Assault

quests.name: Recipe for Disaster/Freeing the Goblin generals
quests.description: The goblin generals need a food that they'll both eat. Find a chef in [[Goblin Village]] to learn how to make it.

requirements.label: Either blue, black, green, or purple dye (purple dye spawns directly east of the spirit tree at the Khazard Battlefield, south of the Ardougne Castle)
Spice or Gnome spice (can be bought or stolen from the Ardougne market, bought from the Culinaromancer's Chest or bought in the Tree Gnome Stronghold)
Charcoal or Ground charcoal (buy in Shilo Village, Jiminua's Jungle Store or Gunslik's Assorted Items.)

optionalRequirements.label: Falador teleport
Lumbridge teleport
Goblin village sphere (Requires Another Slice of H.A.M. quest)

quests.name: Black Knights' Fortress
quests.description: The Black Knights are up to no good. You are hired by the white knights to spy on them and destroy their secret weapon.

requirements.label: The ability to evade level 33 Black Knights
Cabbage (can be obtained from the cabbage patch in Edgeville Monastery and South Falador Farm, as well as Lumbridge cellar. Cabbages obtained from Draynor Manor CANNOT be used)
Iron chainbody (can be purchased at Horvik's Armour Shop in Varrock and from Wayne's Chains in Falador)
Bronze med helm (can be purchased in the helmet shop in Barbarian Village, spawns by the backdoor of Draynor Manor)

optionalRequirements.label: Food
Armour
Falador teleports
(Members only) Combat bracelet to the Monastery and head west towards the Black Knights' Fortress

quests.name: Goblin Diplomacy
quests.description: There's a disturbance in the Goblin Village. Help the goblins solve their dispute so the world doesn't have to worry about rioting goblins. Aim: to help the goblins decide which colour they will wear.

requirements.label: 1 Blue dye (or 2 woad leaves and 5 coins to obtain a blue dye from Aggie)
Offer 20 coins to Wyson the gardener and he will give you two woad leaves
1 Red dye (or 3 redberries and 5 coins to obtain a red dye from Aggie)
1 Yellow dye (2 onions and 5 coins to obtain a yellow dye from Aggie)

quests.name: Cook's Assistant
quests.description:
The Lumbridge Castle cook is in a mess. It is the Duke of Lumbridge's birthday and the cook is making the cake.

He needs a lot of ingredients and doesn't have much time.

quests.name: Romeo & Juliet
quests.description: [[Romeo]] and [[Juliet]] are desperately in love, but Juliet's father doesn't approve. Help them to find a way to get married and live happily ever after.

optionalRequirements.label: Fast travel to Varrock to start the quest - Varrock Teleport or Chronicle or Ring of wealth to Grand Exchange or Skills necklace to Cooks' Guild

quests.name: Dragon Slayer I
quests.description: Prove yourself a true champion. Kill the mighty dragon Elvarg of Crandor and earn the right to buy and wear the Rune platebody.

requirements.label: The ability to defeat a level 83 dragon
Unfired bowl (can be made with soft clay on a Potter's Wheel with link=Crafting|alt=Crafting 8 Crafting)
Wizard's mind bomb (can be bought in the Rising Sun Inn in Falador or The Toad and Chicken in Burthorpe)
Lobster pot (can be bought from any fishing shop)
Silk (can be bought from Thessalia for 30 coins or the Al Kharid silk stall for 3 coins -- members can steal it from the Ardougne silk stall with link=Thieving|alt=Thieving 20 Thieving)
Magic/ranged weapon as well as a law and air rune (to cast Telekinetic Grab if your Magic level is 33 or higher) or 10,000 coins
90 steel nails (Members can buy these from the Sawmill operator north-east of Varrock, they can also be smithed at link=Smithing|alt=Smithing 34 Smithing using 6 steel bars by all players)
Free-to-play: Pick up the spawns in the Graveyard of Shadows, level 19 Wilderness, or for a safer option, ornate lockboxes in the Camdozaal Vault after Below Ice Mountain
Member: Several other spawn locations or buy them at the sawmill
2,000 coins

optionalRequirements.label: otherwise you will have to pay 10,000 coins.
for Protect from Magic against Elvarg's magic attacks.
(Members only) Antifire potions to significantly lower Elvarg's dragonfire attack damage
Weight-reducing clothing (Members only) and stamina (Members only) or energy potions
Fast travel to several locations
Champions' Guild to start the quest, plus one additional trip - Chronicle, Varrock Teleport, or combat bracelet (Members only)
Edgeville (2 trips) - Amulet of glory (Members only), Combat bracelet (Members only), fairy ring  (Members only), Varrock Teleport, Canoe
Melzar's Maze (1 trip) - Teleport to House (Members only) (Rimmington), Skills necklace to Crafting Guild (Members only)
Ice Mountain (1 trip) - Combat bracelet to Edgeville Monastery (Members only), Amulet of glory to Edgeville (Members only), Falador Teleport

Port Sarim (1 trip) - Amulet of glory to Draynor Village (Members only), Explorer's ring 2-4 (Members only), Teleport to House (Rimmington) (Members only), Skills necklace to Crafting Guild (Members only)
Optional: Karamja Volcano for shortcut to return to the Elvarg fight - amulet of glory to Karamja (Members only)

quests.name: Shield of Arrav
quests.description: Varrockian literature tells of a valuable shield, stolen long ago from the museum of [[Varrock]], by a gang of professional thieves. See if you can track down this shield and return it to the museum. You will need a friend to help you complete this quest.

requirements.label: A trustworthy friend or partner. Players can join the official chat-channel "OSRS SOA" to look for a partner.
Phoenix Gang: 20 coins
Black Arm Gang: 2 Phoenix crossbows (obtained during the quest)

quests.name: Rune Mysteries
quests.description: After the first [[Wizards' Tower]] burned down a hundred years ago, the incantation allowing teleportation to the [[rune essence mine]] was lost. However, after much research from the [[Order of Wizards]], the incantation is on the verge of rediscovery...

optionalRequirements.label: Fast travel to several locations
Lumbridge to start the quest - Lumbridge Teleport or Lumbridge Home Teleport
Varrock (1 trip) - Varrock teleport or Chronicle or Skills necklace to Cooks' Guild (Members only) or Ring of wealth to Grand Exchange (Members only)
Wizard's Tower (2 trips) - Necklace of passage or Amulet of the eye or Amulet of glory to Draynor Village (All Members only)

quests.name: Druidic Ritual
quests.description: The Druids north of Taverley need help making a potion to reclaim the stone circle south of Varrock.

requirements.label: 3 dyes of any colour (to unlock Menaphite clothing) OR 3 animal pelts of the same kind (to unlock the Desert outfit). This includes cowhide, grey wolf fur, snakeskin, bear fur, or wool (not balls of wool)
100 coins (for blackjack street urchin, optional)

optionalRequirements.label: Recommended
~1,000 coins for carpet rides to Pollnivneach and Sophanem (and back to Shantay Pass)
Ring of dueling to quickly get to Al Kharid
A teleport to Varrock

quests.name: Demon Slayer
quests.description: A mighty demon is being summoned to destroy the city of Varrock. You find out you are the one destined to stop him (or at least try).

requirements.label: The ability to defeat a level 27 demon aided by three level 20 Dark wizards and two level 7 Dark wizards using the Silverlight in melee.
25 bones (can't be noted, but can be delivered in increments)
1 coin

optionalRequirements.label: Armour and some food
Fast travel to several locations
Varrock to start the quest - Varrock teleport or Chronicle or Skills necklace to Cooks' Guild (Members only) or Ring of wealth to Grand Exchange (Members only)
Wizard's Tower (1 trip) - Necklace of passage or Amulet of the eye or Amulet of glory to Draynor Village (All Members only)
Champions' Guild (1 trip) - Chronicle or Combat bracelet (Members only) or Varrock Teleport

quests.name: Sheep Shearer
quests.description: Fred the Farmer's sheep are getting mighty woolly. He will pay you to shear them.

requirements.label: 20 balls of wool (unnoted)

quests.name: Lost City
quests.description: Can you find the legendary lost city of [[Zanaris]]?

requirements.label: Ability to kill a level 101 Tree spirit with limited armour and weapons.
Woodcutting axe (you will need to bank the axe before accessing Entrana - you cannot use a blessed axe)

optionalRequirements.label: Weight-reducing clothing and stamina or energy potions
Food (armour is not allowed on Entrana)
If using Magic for the Entrana Dungeon (recommended):
Magic and enough runes to cast Fire Strike for the Tree Spirit which has a 35% Fire weakness OR
Magic and enough runes to cast Crumble Undead against the Zombies and the Tree Spirit, who are susceptible to it (about 65 casts should be enough)
A Celastrus bark to fletch into a battlestaff for the added Magic bonus (requires  Fletching)
If using Melee for the Entrana Dungeon:
Prayer potion (Prayer is almost fully drained when entering the dungeon)
Rings of recoil
If using Ranged as an alternative to Magic against the Zombies (not recommended for the Tree spirit):
Arrows, bow string and an unstrung bow
Fast travel to several locations:
Lumbridge Swamp to start the quest (plus one additional trip) - Necklace of passage or Ring of the elements or Amulet of glory or Lumbridge Teleport
Entrana (1 trip) - Monk of Entrana on the second northern dock at Port Sarim or Balloon transport system.
An instant teleport to leave the Entrana Dungeon (the only alternative is to leave via the Magic Door to level 32 wilderness)

quests.name: Tutorial Island (quest)
quests.description: N/A

quests.name: Current Affairs
quests.description: Help [[Arhein]] get past some political red tape and unlock the [[current duck]], a useful Sailing tool.

requirements.label: 50 Coins

optionalRequirements.label: Highly recommended: A boat docked at the Catherby docks - you will be required to sail nearby at the end of the quest

quests.name: Heroes' Quest
quests.description: Prove you are worthy to enter the Heroes' Guild. To prove your status as a hero you will need to obtain a number of items. There are many challenges standing between you and these items.

requirements.label: A partner
Ice gloves (obtainable during the quest) or Smiths gloves (i)
Dusty key (obtainable during the quest; if travelling to Taverley Dungeon for the lava eel, without 70 Agility) OR a knife or slash weapon (if travelling to the Lava Maze for the lava eel)
Pickaxe
If you are a Black Arm Gang member (Note: If you are returning to the mansion after the quest to help another player, you do not need the black armour anymore):
If you are a Phoenix Gang member:
Some form of Ranged or Magic attack method (if using a Toxic Blowpipe make sure it is set to Longrange)

optionalRequirements.label: Weapons and armour to kill the Ice Queen
Stamina or energy potions
Anti-dragon or dragonfire shield to protect against the blue dragons' dragonfire breath
Antifire potion to protect against dragonfire breath (Note: Using both the potion and shield fully negates dragonfire damage)

Burthorpe (games necklace or Burthorpe Games Room grouping teleport)

quests.name: Scorpion Catcher
quests.description: Thormac the Sorcerer has a hobby involving scorpions. Unfortunately, three of them have escaped and managed to run far away. If you manage to find them all, he may just be able to perform an important service for you.

requirements.label: The ability to run past level 172 black demons and level 64 poison spiders
Dusty key (obtainable during the quest) or link=Agility|alt=Agility 70 Agility .

optionalRequirements.label: Antifire potion (provides complete immunity to the dragonfire if used with an anti-dragon or dragonfire shield)
Antipoison or superantipoison

Barbarian Outpost (games necklace or Barbarian teleport)

quests.name: Family Crest
quests.description: There is a man in [[Varrock]] who needs a bit of help. He is of noble heritage, but without his family's crest, he can't prove it. Unfortunately, his three sons took the crest with them when they left, scattering all across Gielinor.

requirements.label: The ability to defeat a level 170 demon (can be safespotted)
Pickaxe - adamant or rune (41+ Mining) highly recommended
2 cut rubies
Any poison cure (you will lose this item). Does not need to contain full doses.
Means to cast all 4 Blast spells

optionalRequirements.label: An extra antipoison potion for yourself (for the poison spiders in Edgeville Dungeon)

quests.name: Fishing Contest
quests.description: The mountain Dwarves' home would be an ideal way to get across White Wolf Mountain safely. However, the Dwarves aren't too fond of strangers. They will let you through if you can bring them a trophy. The trophy is the prize for the annual Hemenster fishing competition.

requirements.label: 5 coins (10 if you buy a fishing rod from Jack)
Fishing rod or Pearl fishing rod (oily fishing rod does not work)
Red vine worm (obtainable during quest)

optionalRequirements.label: Food and armour for low levels

quests.name: The Red Reef
quests.description: Investigate the dealings of the Red Reef Trading Company and gain access to some trees to cut.

quests.name: Temple of Ikov
quests.description: A mysterious stranger called Lucien asks you to go on a mission deep under the Temple of Ikov in central Kandarin. He wants you to retrieve an artefact known as the Staff of Armadyl. After you retrieve it, the quest doesn't stop there... Are you on the side of good or evil?

requirements.label: The ability to defeat a level 84 enemy with Ranged
Any bow capable of firing ice arrows (yew bow or better) or any thrown weapon
A method of reducing your weight to at least -1kg temporarily:
Boots of lightness (can be obtained during the quest with a light source and slash weapon, such as a lit candle and knife

optionalRequirements.label: and prayer potions for protection prayers

quests.description: King Arthur is sending out his knights on a quest for the famous Holy Grail. If you are a Knight of the Round Table go to King Arthur for further orders.

requirements.label: Must be able to defeat a level 120 Black Knight Titan (can be safespotted or flinched)
Excalibur

optionalRequirements.label: Melee is highly recommended as the Black Knight Titan has +1000 magic and ranged defence

quests.name: Sheep Herder
quests.description: Dispose of plagued sheep and save Ardougne!

requirements.label: 100 coins

optionalRequirements.label: Energy restoring items

Fast travel to East Ardougne to start the quest - Ardougne Teleport or Skills necklace to Fishing Guild or Spirit tree to Battlefield or fairy ring to  or Captain Barnaby's ship from Rimmington or Brimhaven
Optionally a Skills necklace to save some time when walking from East Ardougne to the Fishing Guild

quests.name: Plague City
quests.description: The western part of Ardougne has been shut off as a deadly plague sweeps through the people. However, a young woman who went in to try to help those stricken by the illness has disappeared and her parents have become worried.

requirements.label: Dwellberries (Spawns in McGrubor's Wood, squeeze through the loose railing, use ALS, or Telekinetic Grab them. They can be bought from Heckel Funch or Hudo in the Tree Gnome Stronghold or grown with 36 Farming.)
Rope (Purchasable in the East Ardougne general store, Port Khazard general store, Ned, or a spawn in Karamja general store.)
1-4 buckets of water (four uses required, there is a water source and bucket spawn nearby)
Hangover cure or the ingredients to make one:
Bucket of milk (Obtained by using a bucket on a dairy cow, one is north of Ardougne, or bought from Hudo or Heckel Funch.)
Snape grass (Spawns west of the Crafting Guild or the peninsula north-east of Hosidius. It can be grown at 61 Farming. Can also be obtained from killing Tribesmen in Karamja.)
Picture of Elena (Inside Alrena and Edmond's house)

optionalRequirements.label: Fast travel to Ardougne to start the quest - Skills necklace to Fishing Guild or Spirit tree to Battlefield or fairy ring to  or Captain Barnaby's ship from Rimmington or Brimhaven

quests.name: Sea Slug
quests.description:
Something strange is happening on the [[Fishing Platform]].
Missing fishermen and the presence of dozens of strange sea creatures gives cause for concern.
Investigate the platform, discover the truth before it's too late.

requirements.label: Swamp paste (made by mixing flour with swamp tar then cooking the mixture on a fire; can also be bought from a Trader crewmember for 75 coins, from Rasolo for 60 coins west of the Fishing Guild, or from the Khazard General Store for 42 coins at full stock)

optionalRequirements.label: Small fishing net for Ardougne Medium Diary (can be bought near quest start in Witchaven)

quests.name: Jungle Potion
quests.description: [[Trufitus Shakaya]] of the [[Tai Bwo Wannai Village]] requires that you collect five special jungle herbs for a potion so he can commune with his Gods.

requirements.label: The ability to defend against level 53 Jogres and level 46 Harpie Bug Swarms.

optionalRequirements.label: 1-2 antidote++ or other antipoison potions
Food
Stamina potions
Combat equipment to kill a level 53 Jogre for an easy Karamja Diary task

Fast travel to Tai Bwo Wannai Village to start the quest - Brimhaven teleport, Teleport to House (Brimhaven), Captain Barnaby's ship from Ardougne to Brimhaven, fairy ring  or amulet of glory to Karamja

quests.name: The Grand Tree
quests.description: The [[Grand Tree]], which shelters the majority of the small gnome population of Gielinor, is dying. Is it human sabotage or an inside job? Help [[King Shareen]] to find the true cause and save the tree gnomes from an uncertain fate.

requirements.label: The ability to defeat a level 172 Black demon (safespottable for Ranged and Magic or melee using a halberd).
1,000 coins if you previously chose not to help Femi on your first entry to the Tree Gnome Stronghold (not required if you never used the gate entrance)

optionalRequirements.label: Stamina or energy potions
Combat equipment to defeat a level 172 Black demon, Magic recommended
Fast travel to several locations:

Tree Gnome Stronghold to start the quest, plus 2 additional trips - spirit tree from Grand Exchange or Battlefield, slayer ring to the Stronghold Slayer Cave, Balloon Transport System, or necklace of passage to the Outpost

Hazelmere's house (1 trip) - fairy ring , Watchtower Teleport, Teleport to House (Yanille), Grouping teleport to Nightmare Zone or Fishing Trawler, Ardougne cloak 1-4 to Ardougne Monastery, or ring of dueling to Castle Wars

quests.name: Underground Pass
quests.description: There are rumours of a secret passageway that can be used to get to the other side of the mountains west of Ardougne. Now it's just a matter of finding it.

requirements.label: Bow

1-5 arrows (only non-poisoned arrows with metal arrowtips will work. Craw's bow does not work. Crossbows and bolts will not work. Broad arrows, Ogre arrows, Ice arrows, and Training Arrows will also not work.)

optionalRequirements.label: Weapon or combat spells. Using the bow is recommended if you need to save inventory space.
Armour or  for Protect from Melee.

Lots of food to survive traps and monsters. Taking a few Summer Pies is highly recommended if under 60 Agility, as eating these heals 22 in two bites and boosts your agility level by 5 per bite. Alternatively, Saradomin brews or super restores to reduce weight.
Coins to buy food from Kamen (75 coins each time for food that heals a total of 28 hitpoints).
Bones to peaches magic tablets (as there are weak mobs that can be killed for bones when you need food)
West Ardougne Teleport to quickly access the Underground Pass (dungeon) entrance.
Level 79 combat will make Blessed spiders non-aggressive, which saves some time while killing Kalrag.
An explorer's ring and stamina or energy potions
2+ Agility potions if not taking summer pies (for players with a low Agility level).
Telekinetic Grab runes for the Amulet of othanian
Any instant teleportation method if you need to leave the dungeon

quests.name: Observatory Quest
quests.description: The Observatory in south-west Ardougne has been ransacked by a family of nearby goblins. Can you help the professor to rebuild it?

optionalRequirements.label: Antipoison (a 1-dose superantipoison spawns in a house next to the entrance to the Observatory Dungeon)
Armour and some food for lower levels
Stamina or energy potions
Fast travel to the Observatory to start the quest - ring of dueling or Grouping teleport to Castle Wars, Ourania Teleport, Spirit tree to Battlefield, Ardougne cloak to Ardougne Monastery, fairy ring

quests.name: The Tourist Trap
quests.description:
South of Al Kharid a new desert pass has opened up, leading to the dangers of the Kharid desert.
Equip your desert garb and make sure your waterskin is full before heading off into the trackless dunes in search of desert adventure.

requirements.label: The ability to defeat a level 47 enemy
Note that all of the required items can be bought from Shantay at the Shantay Pass.
Desert shirt, robe, and boots (black versions do not work)
Means to enter the desert such as the Shantay pass, Desert amulet 2, Teleport tablet or scrolls, Fairy rings or the Pharaoh's sceptre

optionalRequirements.label: Combat equipment to defeat a level 47 Mercenary Captain, and the inventory space to unequip it immediately afterwards
1-2 full waterskins and a knife or slash weapon to refill them by cutting cacti
Stamina or energy potions
Pickaxe if caught in the mine to mine 15 rocks to get out

quests.name: Watchtower
quests.description: The Wizards of the Yanille Watch Tower have been reporting increased ogre sightings recently. Use a wide variety of your skills to help the wizards recover their stolen power crystals and stop the advance of the ogre hordes!

requirements.label: The ability to defeat a level 68 Ogre and run past level 111 Blue dragons
20 coins
Pickaxe
Any light source (obtainable during the quest)
Bat bones (obtainable during the quest with a knife or slash weapon, grinding the bat bones before starting the quest to leave the pestle and mortar in the bank is also an option)

optionalRequirements.label: Any instant teleportation method if you need to leave the Ogre cave
Weapon, armour and some food
Stamina or energy potions

Anti-dragon/Dragonfire shield and antifire potions or a super antifire to greatly reduce the damage taken from the blue dragons in the Ogre Enclave (using both or just super antifire completely negates dragonfire damage)
for protection prayers

Fast travel to the Watchtower and the Ogre Enclave (Yanille teleport, Teleport to house if your house is in Yanille, Nightmare Zone or Castle Wars minigame teleport, ring of dueling to Castle Wars or Fairy Rings to )
a crossbow and a mith grapple for the shortcut over Yanille's southern wall

quests.name: Dwarf Cannon
quests.description:
For several years now, the Dwarven Black Guard have been developing the latest in projectile warfare.

With the constant attack of goblin renegades, the dwarven troops who protect the mines need to put this secret weapon into action.

Only with your help can the true power of this cannon be harnessed!

optionalRequirements.label: Food at very low combat levels.
Stamina or energy potions.
Fast travel to several locations:
West of the Coal Trucks to start the quest plus 1 additional trip - skills necklace to Fishing Guild or games necklace to Barbarian Outpost
Goblin Cave (1 trip) - skills necklace to Fishing Guild
Dwarven Mine entrance (1 trip) - Amulet of glory to Edgeville or combat bracelet to the Monastery

quests.name: The Dig Site
quests.description:
Feeling uneducated? Desperate for buried treasure?

"There's gold in them there hills" (well stream actually) as well as many other items that can be found at the digsite. Join the students in their attempt to be a qualified archaeologist, and become experienced in making the earth move!

Have you got what it takes to unearth the hidden altar to one of RuneScape's lesser-known Gods?

requirements.label: Cup of tea (can be stolen from the Varrock tea stall) or nettle tea or cup of tea (nettle)
Specimen brush (obtained during the quest)
Specimen jar (obtained during the quest)
Panning tray (obtained during the quest)
Trowel (obtained during the quest)

optionalRequirements.label: Weight-reducing clothing and stamina or energy potions
Fast travel to several locations:
Exam Centre south of The Digsite to start the quest, plus 1 additional trip - Digsite Teleport, gnome glider, or Varrock Teleport
Varrock museum (1-2 trips, extra trip if claiming post quest rewards) - Varrock Teleport, Chronicle, ring of wealth to Grand Exchange, or skills necklace to Cooking Guild
The Digsite (2-4 trips from the Exam Centre, this saves minimal time) - Digsite Teleport

quests.name: Gertrude's Cat
quests.description: Gertrude has lost her cat Fluffs and desperately wants to find her. Can you help bring her home?

requirements.label: 100 coins
Seasoned sardine (Bought from the Grand Exchange) or alternatively:
Raw sardine (can be bought from Gerrant's Fishy Business.)

optionalRequirements.label: Ring of charos (a) (to choose the colour of your kitten)
Axe and 100 coins to cut down a dying tree in the Lumber Yard and create a normal plank for two easy Varrock Diary tasks.
Fast travel to several locations
Cooks' Guild in Varrock (2 trips) - Skills necklace or Varrock Teleport or Ring of wealth to Grand Exchange or Chronicle
Lumberyard east of Varrock (1 trip) - Lumberyard Teleport or Ring of the elements

quests.name: Legends' Quest
quests.description: Only the elite are allowed to call themselves a member of the Legends' Guild. Do you have what it takes to make it in?

requirements.label: The ability to defeat a level 187 demon
2 gold bars (6 in case you fail or want more gold bowls)
Rune, Dragon or Infernal axe
Lockpick (2 in case you fail) (Strange old lockpick does not work)
Pickaxe
Ardrigal (obtainable during the quest)
Snake weed (obtainable during the quest)
One of each cut gem up to diamond:
2 law runes

Unpowered orb and runes to cast any Charge Orb once (requires the standard spellbook equipped - note that at Magic level 56 you can only cast the Charge Water Orb spell - two casts are needed if taking the "long path" during the second fight with the demon)

optionalRequirements.label: Super restore potion if your levels are not far above the following required levels, as failing will reduce them and you might need them for certain objectives:
to squeeze through the crevice behind the bookcase
to pick the first Ancient Gate
to smash the boulders
to force the second Ancient Gate
Items that give a temporary skill boost to skip some levels in skilling (such as Botanical pies,Summer pies, Dwarven stouts, and Axeman's Folly)
Weapon, armour, food and several prayer potions
Fast travel to the Legends' Guild (Ardougne teleport or Fairy rings to )
Fast travel to the Karamja jungle (Brimhaven teleport, Teleport to House if it is in Brimhaven, charter ship or ship from Ardougne to Brimhaven, Fairy rings to  or amulet of glory to Karamja)

quests.name: Death Plateau
quests.description:
Trolls have come down from the north and are camped on Death Plateau. They are using this base to launch attacks on the principality of Burthorpe!
The Imperial Guard is taking heavy losses. They need your help!

requirements.label: 60 coins (bring 1000 for the gambling dice with Harold part)
Asgarnian ale (can be found on the bar at the pub in Burthorpe)

optionalRequirements.label: Games necklace for Burthorpe teleports or Combat bracelet for Warriors' Guild teleports
Stamina or energy potions

quests.name: Eadgar's Ruse
quests.description:
Sanfew requires a rare herb for the next part of the purifying ritual.

Travel back to the Troll Stronghold to find this herb that the trolls use as an ingredient for their favourite dish.

requirements.label: Climbing boots (or 12 coins to buy from Tenzing)

Fast travel to Taverley (Games necklace, Taverley teleport, Teleport to House if your house is in Taverley, use the Balloon transport system, or alternatively a Falador teleport)
God Wars Dungeon route to Trollheim:
Ghommal's hilt 1 or better
Burthorpe route to Trollheim:
Fast travel to Burthorpe (games necklace or combat bracelet to Warriors' Guild)
for shortcuts around the rockthrowing Trolls ( for more shortcuts to Eadgar)
Fremennik route to Trollheim:
Fast travel to Fremennik Slayer Dungeon (Slayer ring or Fairy Rings to )

quests.name: Big Chompy Bird Hunting
quests.description:
Rantz the Ogre needs to feed his demanding children, Fycie and Bugs, so he wants to go Big Chompy Bird hunting. Problem is, he's all fingers and thumbs when it comes to making ogre arrows.

Could someone please give him a hand?

requirements.label: The ability to defend against level 64 wolves and level 53 ogres
Any axe that you can use (Blessed axe does not work)
Feathers (100 to be safe; coloured feathers from link=Hunter|alt=Hunter Hunter work)
Bringing 50 to buy 25 feathers from Fycie also works
Knife (or 10 to buy a knife and chisel from Bugs)
Chisel (or 10 to buy a knife and chisel from Bugs)
4 wolf bones (obtainable during the quest from level 65 wolves or from level 14 wolves in the Stronghold of Security)

Stamina or energy potions and some food
Feldip hills teleport or Fairy Rings to  (or gnome glider after completion of One Small Favour)

quests.name: Monkey Madness I
quests.description:
The King of the northern Gnomes, Narnode Shareen, is once again in need of your help. He recently decided to send an envoy of his Royal Guard, the 10th squad, to oversee the decommissioning of the Gnome owned ship-building facilities on the eastern coast of [[Karamja]].

It has been quite some time since the 10th squad were dispatched and they have been deemed missing in action. It will be up to you, should you decide to help, to find out what fate befell the 10th squad and if possible, track them down.

If only it were so simple. Sinister forces have begun to spread through the Gnome hierarchy and threaten to unleash an unknown terror upon the world. Far across the land, the fires of vengeance are being stoked once again. Can you unravel the mystery behind the deception? Can you separate the truth from the lies? Can you decide for yourself what is real and what is not?

requirements.label: The ability to defeat a level 195 Jungle Demon
Five empty inventory slots
Monkey bones or corpse from Karamja (obtainable during quest)

optionalRequirements.label: Prayer highly recommended, as the player will be attacked by numerous hard-hitting melee enemies in multicombat
Poison cures such as antipoison or antidote++
Energy-restoring items such as the explorer's ring along with energy and stamina potions
Prayer potions
A knife for free healing, as there are pineapple plants around Ape Atoll
High healing food
Weight-reducing clothing
Ardougne cloak 1 or Ardougne teleports File:Ardougne teleport (tablet).png

A ring of dueling to bank quickly (the Ardougne cloak could be used instead, although it's somewhat further from a bank; the Battlefield of Khazard has a spirit tree, and the Gnome Stronghold has a bank and glider service)
200,000 coins (if skipping the puzzle)

quests.name: Haunted Mine
quests.description:
Recent forays into Morytania by some of Saradomin's more fanatical supporters have unearthed murky rumours concerning an abandoned mine in the south.

Legend speaks of an unusual material, hidden in the depths of the mines, that is somehow linked to the desolation and fear that now surrounds the place. Do you have the nerve to find out more, and enter the haunted mines of Morytania?

requirements.label: The ability to defeat a level 95 enemy
Access to Abandoned Mine

optionalRequirements.label: 2 empty inventory spaces, one for Zealot's key and one for the glowing fungus
Fast travel to Abandoned Mine to start the quest - Mort'ton Teleport, fairy ring  (req ), Shades of Mort'ton minigame teleport, Barrows Teleport, fairy ring  and take the swamp boaty
A filled druid pouch if not using the low fence agility shortcut from Burgh de Rott to skip the swamp section
A pickaxe to mine mithril ore after the quest for the hard Morytania Diary (obtainable during the quest) (requires )
A Slayer Ring for easy completion of the Lair of Tarn Razorlor miniquest after completing Haunted Mine
The boss fight at the end of the quest is considerably more difficult than the boss's combat level may suggest. It is highly recommended to bring:
Good combat equipment (at least level 50 is advised)
Magic is recommended ‚Äî see the boss section of the guide for more details
1-2 prayer potions
1 stamina potion or 1 super energy potion
Combat stat boosting potions (depending on your attack style)
Plenty of good food is strongly recommended for all levels, regardless of equipment and Defence
Dragon dagger or another weapon with a high-hitting special attack

quests.name: In Search of the Myreque
quests.description: Canifis is experiencing an upsurge in new faces and a new stranger has appeared with a job to track down some local heroes known only as "The Myreque". The Myreque are fighting a desperate battle against the darkness of Morytania and he wishes to take them weapons to aid in the battle. Can you help him out?

requirements.label: The ability to defeat a level 97 foe (safespottable)
A Druid pouch containing at least 5 charges (3 charges must be added per fill)
A Silver sickle (b) to collect these items for the charges if not buying from the Grand Exchange
A hammer or Imcando hammer
10 coins or a ring of charos (a)

optionalRequirements.label: Prayer for Protect from Melee
Prayer potions
Food
Fast travel to several locations
Canifis to start the quest - Kharyrll Teleport, Salve Graveyard Teleport, fairy ring , Slayer ring to Slayer Tower, or Fenkenstrain's Castle Teleport
Mort'ton (1 trip) - Mort'ton Teleport, Shades of Mort'ton minigame teleport, Barrows Teleport, or fairy ring  and take the swamp boaty

quests.name: Creature of Fenkenstrain
quests.description:
[[Dr Fenkenstrain]], master and sole occupant of the castle to the north-east of [[Canifis]], needs a new servant to go on a dark errand for him.

Do you have the stomach to help Fenkenstrain complete his twisted purpose?

requirements.label: Partial completion of The Restless Ghost
Able to defeat a level 51 monster and run past level 72 monsters
Ghostspeak amulet
Needle (costume needle does not work)
50 coins OR 1 law & 1 air rune for Telekinetic Grab (requires link=Magic|alt=Magic 33 Magic)

optionalRequirements.label: Combat equipment to defeat a level 51 Experiment
Food and Holy symbol (protection against Feral Vampyres) for low combat levels
Weight-reducing clothing and stamina or energy potions
Fast travel to several locations
Canifis to start the quest - Salve Graveyard Teleport or Kharyrll Teleport or fairy ring
Fenkenstrain's Castle (2 trips) - Fenkenstrain's Castle Teleport
Quick access to a furnace:
Ectophial or 2 ecto-tokens for access to the Port Phasmatys furnace
Amulet of glory to Edgeville

quests.name: Tears of Guthix
quests.description: Deep in the caves in the [[Lumbridge Swamp]] is an enchanted place where the tears shed by [[Guthix]] when it saw the destruction [[Saradomin]] and [[Zamorak]] had caused with their wars flow from the very walls. These tears are said to have magical properties to help players gain deeper understanding of the world. However, the cave is guarded by a loyal serpent named [[Juna]] who blocks passage from everyone. However, she has grown bored from three thousand years of sitting in the dark cave and wishes to hear stories of life above. Maybe you could come to some sort of arrangement...?

requirements.label: Lit sapphire lantern (use a cut sapphire on a bullseye lantern or on a bullseye lantern (unf)), make sure to use a tinderbox on it as Juna is busy
Swamp tar to fill an empty sapphire lantern using the chemist in Rimmington or the lamp still in Dorgesh-Kaan
Pickaxe
Rope (if you have not yet entered the Lumbridge Swamp Caves)

optionalRequirements.label: Spiny helmet/Slayer helmet to prevent damage from wall beasts, if you have not progressed far enough through The Lost Tribe to access the caves from the Lumbridge Castle cellar.

quests.name: Murder Mystery
quests.description: Old man Sinclair has been found dead in his mansion! Unfortunately, the local authorities are having some trouble figuring out who's the guilty party. Maybe the unbiased eye of a passing adventurer will be of help.

optionalRequirements.label: 16 empty inventory spaces
Weight-reducing clothing

quests.name: The Lost Tribe
quests.description:
Sigmund is the advisor to the [[Duke Horacio|Duke]] of Lumbridge, but the [[Duke Horacio|Duke]] does not always take his advice.

When part of the cellar wall collapses the [[Duke Horacio|Duke]] insists the damage was caused by an earthquake, but Sigmund is worried about a monster attack.

If you investigate this mystery it will lead you through treacherous caves to uncover something lost by the Gods for thousands of years.

requirements.label: Pickaxe
Light source (Note: Candles, torches, and oil lamps can cause swamp gas explosions if going off-route, and need a tinderbox to stay lit)

optionalRequirements.label: Fast travel to Varrock, Falador, Lumbridge, and Mind Altar Teleport (teleport spells or tablets)
Lockpick for the H.A.M. Hideout if Thieving is low.
Stamina potion if below 70 Agility

quests.name: The Giant Dwarf
quests.description:
Five hundred years have passed since the rule of King Alvis, saviour of Keldagrim and victim of his own inventions.

He founded the Consortium: the gathering of Mining companies that were to serve the monarchy. But, eventually, the monarchy came to serve the Consortium.

By the time of his death, the monarchy was all but abolished. Now the Kings in Keldagrim are but a distant memory... with only the statue of King Alvis to remind the people of the old days, the dark days.

So begins the Rise of the Red Axe, the new multi-part storyline centred around the dwarves and their capital of Keldagrim. The first quest, The Giant Dwarf, introduces the city and the powerful business Consortium that rules the dwarven realm. Discover weird goings-on, narrowly escape from falling chunks of rock, ride around in minecarts and... make sure you don't bump into the wrong person on the way to the city!

requirements.label: 200 coins for the clothes
Means to cast Telekinetic Grab (air and law rune)
Coal (obtainable during the quest with 30 Mining)
Various ores and bars (mostly obtainable during the quest, see below)

optionalRequirements.label: Fast travel to several locations
Keldagrim, east of Rellekka (Fairy rings to , Enchanted Lyre, Rellekka teleport or Teleport to House if your house is in Rellekka)
Mudskipper Point (Fairy rings to , Rat Pits grouping teleport to Port Sarim, Rimmington teleport or Teleport to House if your house is in Rimmington)
Varrock, if you have not yet met Thurgo in The Knight's Sword (Varrock teleport, Chronicle, ring of wealth to the Grand Exchange or combat bracelet to the Champions' Guild)
Stamina or energy potions
Alternatively, you can gather all these materials, except clay, during the quest with , and either about 5000 coins or a pickaxe and .
H.A.M. Robes (Optional)

quests.name: Mourning's End Part I
quests.description:
It seems at last Arianwyn has need of your skills.

He believes there is more to the Mourners than meets the eye and he wishes for you to find out just what they're up to. Can you gain the trust of the Mourners?

requirements.label: The ability to defeat a level 11 enemy with your combat stats set to 20 each.
Each of these dyes: red, yellow, green, and blue (can be bought during the quest for 6 coins each).
You may want to bring additional dyes to collect multiple coloured toads in case you miss when firing the device.
Rotten apple (must be the rotten apple on the ground north of the Mourner Headquarters in West Ardougne, obtainable during the quest)
Ogre bellows (obtainable during the quest)
Barrel of naphtha, or 5-9 coal to make one
7 empty inventory spaces for the Mourner gear

optionalRequirements.label: Weapon
Food if your combat level is low
Ardougne or West Ardougne teleport tablets (runes may be inconvenient as your Magic will be lowered by the Mourner)
Ring of dueling to reset drained stats at the Pool of Refreshment in the Ferox Enclave
Necklace of passage for faster access to Arandar, via the Outpost
Fast travel to Taverley (House teleport, Balloon network, Falador teleport)
Fast travel to Feldip Hills (Feldip hills teleport, Gnome glider, Fairy rings to  or the Eagle transport system to the jungle)
Fast travel to Rimmington, if you have not yet made a barrel of naphtha (Rimmington teleport or Teleport to House if it located there, Skills necklace to the Crafting Guild or a Falador teleport)

quests.name: Forgettable Tale...
quests.description:
Forgettable Tale of a Drunken Dwarf is part 2 in the [[Rise of the Red Axe]] series, focusing on the dwarves and their capital city of [[Keldagrim]]. After the events in [[The Giant Dwarf]], the [[Red Axe]] mining company has departed the city and set up a new headquarters in a remote underground location.

[[Veldaban]], the Commander of the [[Dwarven Black Guard]] in [[Keldagrim]], wants you to investigate the case and find out if the [[Red Axe]] is planning anything nefarious. The problem is, the only lead he's got is an extremely drunken and kebab obsessed dwarf.

Use your farming and brewing abilities to your advantage, then prepare to be perplexed by puzzles as you follow the trail to the [[Red Axe]]...

requirements.label: ~400 coins
2 buckets of water
Seed dibber (no Tool leprechaun in Keldagrim) or partial completion of the Farming portion of the Barbarian Training miniquest
A random item from the list below (see list for details)

optionalRequirements.label: Recommended
A Games necklace/Camelot teleport (to get to White Wolf Mountain quickly) or Ring of dueling and access to the Gnome glider network west of the Emir's Arena
An Enchanted lyre/Slayer ring/Keldagrim minecart system (to teleport near Keldagrim entrance faster)

quests.name: Wanted!
quests.description: A wanted man is on the loose. Can you track him down?

requirements.label: The ability to defeat a level 32 Black Knight.
10,000 coins, or:
Enchanted gem (bought from a Slayer Master)
File:Ultimate ironman chat badge.png The player must deliver all 20 rune essence at once
Light source (Note: Candles, torches and oil lamps can cause swamp gas explosions if going off-route, and need a tinderbox to stay lit)
