quests.name: Dream Mentor
quests.description: Gielinor is not the safest place to live - dragons, trolls, demons... dangerous and despicable monsters of all sorts roam free. In this quest, you must help a fellow adventurer that doesn't do so well against these threats. With perseverance and the magical help of the Moon Clan, there should be no monster that can't be beaten. But is that really true? How about the monsters in your dreams? How about your own inescapable fears? How would you defeat them? Well, you'll soon find out as a tough and often bizarre quest awaits those of a strong will!

requirements.label: The ability to defeat 4 powerful monsters without the use of prayer
A seal of passage

3 different kinds of food: 6 of 1 type and 7 of 2 others for a total of 20 pieces (Sacks of cabbages, potatoes, and onions can be used as they each contain 10 piece of their respective food and only require a total of 3 inventory slots. Fruit baskets also work.)
Goutweed
A good weapon (trident of the seas recommended because they have no magic defence), good armour, good food such as sharks, and super potion sets.

quests.name: King's Ransom
quests.description:
Life has been quiet at the Sinclair Mansion since you discovered the murderer... too quiet. So quiet, in fact, that the family has gone!

Suspicions are running high that the Sinclairs' recent departure is tied to the disappearance of King Arthur and his knights. But time is running short and clues are scarce, will you crack the case in time?

Animate rock scroll (obtainable during the quest). Note: if you have it in your bank, either destroy it or take it with you. You won't be able to receive another from Wizard Cromperty otherwise.

This is the second part of an ongoing adventure. Help Elena discover the truth about the infamous Ardougne plague.

quests.name: Barbarian Training
quests.description: Otto Godblessed has been researching his history and training people in the ways of his ancestors, and now he's ready to teach you. From his hut on the banks of the lake at the top of Baxtorian Falls, you'll go Fishing with your bare hands, mix fish eggs into your potions, wield one-handed spears and, finally, go deep into the ancient cavern beneath the lake.

quests.name: While Guthix Sleeps
quests.description:
This Grandmaster quest sees you continue the Mahjarrat storyline, hunting down one of the most powerful artefacts in existence while ensuring it doesn't fall into the wrong hands.

This artefact is known by many names ‚Äì most recently, the Stone of Jas. It has shaped the course of Gielinor‚Äôs history, from the creation of the first Runes to the fall of Zaros. It was last seen at the devastating end of the God Wars, when Zamorak, in a fit of rage, used it to reduce the land of Forinthry to the Wilderness we know today.

Angered by Zamorak‚Äôs actions, Guthix rose from his age-long slumber and banished the gods. He hid the Stone of Jas far underground, where it could never disturb the balance again...

But while Guthix sleeps, nefarious forces have been gathering: the Mahjarrat. Shaped by war and deadly ritual, their plans for the Stone can only lead to catastrophe.

Facing off against the Mahjarrat is nothing new for dedicated adventurers ‚Äì at every turn, they seem to grow in power and wage war against the people of Gielinor. In their last attempt, we saw them set out to tear Varrock apart with an undead army in Defender of Varrock. What are they plotting now?

quests.name: Monkey Madness II
quests.description:
Glough, the war criminal set on eradicating humans and overthrowing Gielinor, has escaped the watch of the Grand Tree gnomes.

With a history of leaving large-scale conflicts and warfare in his wake, Glough must be tracked down and stopped. King Narnode Shareen needs your help.

quests.name: The Corsair Curse
quests.description:
From the newly revealed town of Corsair Cove, deep in the south of Feldip Hills, the captain of the Corsairs has sailed to Port Sarim seeking help. His crew is sick, and he suspects that a curse has been laid upon them.

If you can unravel the fearful and conflicting tales of ogre relics, vengeful mermaids and demonic possession, maybe you can help his ailing crew overcome The Corsair Curse.

quests.description: The Mysterious Stranger lurks outside of the mighty Theatre of Blood, the centrepiece of Ver Sinhaza. This shadowy figure has a new request for you ‚Äì to humiliate a vampyre noble by the name of Lady Verzik Vitur. Take on the challenges that lie within the Theatre to reach her and bring a blush to her bloodless face!

quests.name: Shadows of Custodia
quests.description: Something is wrong in Auburnvale. A faded notice in the local pub hints at missing children but no one's looking. Locals speak in riddles, strange claw marks scar the walls, and fear hangs heavy in the air. With the town turning a blind eye, it's up to you to uncover the truth hiding in the shadows.

quests.name: The Ides of Milk
quests.description: Lumbridge, the iconic city for all the fresh-faced arrivals and budding adventurers. Home to regular citizens of Gielinor, they chop the trees, work the fields, and tend to the animals of realm, except there has been a disturbance in the nearby cow pen and the steaks have never been higher! Distress runs through the herd and while they have always feared adventurers claiming their lives, a new threat has entered their domain bringing the beef...

You must have all Wardens invocations activated.

combatAchievements.name: Nagua Negation
combatAchievements.description: Kill Amoxliatl without taking any damage.

combatAchievements.name: Perfect Hueycoatl
combatAchievements.description: Kill the Hueycoatl perfectly 5 times without leaving. To get a perfect kill, you must not take any avoidable damage from the Hueycoatl's lightning attack, tail slam attack or off-prayer projectile attacks.

combatAchievements.name: Is it a bird?
combatAchievements.description: Kill the Hueycoatl using only dragonbane weaponry.

combatAchievements.name: Pillar Lover
combatAchievements.description: Kill the Hueycoatl whilst it is vulnerable.

combatAchievements.name: Temotli Triumph
combatAchievements.description: Kill Amoxliatl using only glacial temotli as a weapon.

combatAchievements.name: Totally Shattered
combatAchievements.description: Kill Amoxliatl without any of her unstable ice shattering.

combatAchievements.name: Without Ralos' Light
combatAchievements.description: Kill Amoxliatl without losing any prayer points.

combatAchievements.name: One by one
combatAchievements.description: Kill one Titan at a time, without attacking the other.

combatAchievements.name: Elemental Company
combatAchievements.description: Kill the Royal Titans without attacking any elementals.

combatAchievements.name: Let them fight
combatAchievements.description: Kill the Royal Titans while having the Royal Titans kill a total of 10 elementals.

combatAchievements.name: Royal Titan Champion
combatAchievements.description: Kill the Royal Titans 10 times.

combatAchievements.name: Royal Titan Adept
combatAchievements.description: Kill the Royal Titans 25 times.

combatAchievements.name: It takes too long
combatAchievements.description: Kill both Royal Titans while they are charging up their area attack. Both titans must die during the same charging phase.

combatAchievements.name: Perfect Royal Titans
combatAchievements.description: Kill the Royal Titans without getting hit by any avoidable damage. This includes: Melee attacks, Explosions from the ice or fire elemental, Icicle or fire spawn damage, and Ice or fire pulse attacks.

combatAchievements.name: Royal Titan Speed-Runner
combatAchievements.description: Kill the Royal Titans in less than 1:30 minutes.

combatAchievements.name: Titan Killer
combatAchievements.description: Kill the Royal Titans 15 times without anyone leaving the instance. If a player joins the fight, the current streak will be reset to 0. If a player leaves the fight, the task will be failed and a new instance will need to be created.

combatAchievements.name: I need room
combatAchievements.description: Kill the Royal Titans while extinguishing all fires and melting all icicles before they dissipate naturally.

combatAchievements.name: No time to pray
combatAchievements.description: Kill the Royal Titans without losing any prayer points.

combatAchievements.name: Back so soon?
combatAchievements.description: Defeat Yama without the judge being attacked with the wrong style and without taking more than one instance of damage each time you are exiled from the arena.

combatAchievements.name: Contract Choreographer
combatAchievements.description: Defeat Yama whilst completing 'Shadow Dancer', 'Fire Fighter', 'Back so soon?' and without taking any other avoidable damage.

combatAchievements.name: Contractually Unbound
combatAchievements.description: Defeat Yama under the elevated conditions of one of his non-standard contracts.

combatAchievements.name: Fire fighter
combatAchievements.description: Defeat Yama without getting hit by fire and having only killed void flares with special attacks.

combatAchievements.name: No toppings, no drinks, thanks
combatAchievements.description: Defeat Yama without anybody healing using anything other than plain pizza and without anybody drinking any potions.

combatAchievements.name: Shadow dancer
combatAchievements.description: Defeat Yama without getting hit by shadows and without being more than one tile away from the center of his shadow crash attack.

combatAchievements.name: Yama Adept
combatAchievements.description: Defeat Yama once.

combatAchievements.name: Yama Speed-Chaser
combatAchievements.description: Defeat Yama in an average time of under 3:00 over your last four kills.

combatAchievements.name: Yama Speed-Trialist
combatAchievements.description: Defeat Yama in an average time of under 3:38 over your last four kills.

combatAchievements.name: Yama Veteran
combatAchievements.description: Defeat Yama 50 times.

combatAchievements.name: Yama Speed-Runner
combatAchievements.description: Defeat Yama in an average time of under 2:34 over your last four kills.

combatAchievements.name: Doom Adept
combatAchievements.description: Defeat the Doom of Mokhaiotl at delve level 3.

combatAchievements.name: Doom Veteran
combatAchievements.description: Defeat the Doom of Mokhaiotl at delve level 8.

combatAchievements.name: It's Dark Down Here
combatAchievements.description: Defeat the Doom of Mokhaiotl at delve level 16.

combatAchievements.name: Doom Crawler
combatAchievements.description: Defeat the Doom of Mokhaiotl level 1 in less than 30 seconds.

combatAchievements.name: Exposed Doom
combatAchievements.description: Defeat the Doom of Mokhaiotl during its Melee charge phase.

combatAchievements.name: Doom Chaser
combatAchievements.description: Defeat the Doom of Mokhaiotl levels 1-8 in less than 10:00.

combatAchievements.name: Mokhaiotl Drift
combatAchievements.description: Defeat the Doom of Mokhaiotl at level 8 or above before he finishes the first burrow phase.

combatAchievements.name: Mine's Better
combatAchievements.description: Defeat the Doom of Mokhaiotl levels 1-8 whilst always wearing a shield.

combatAchievements.name: Grub Patrol
combatAchievements.description: Defeat the Doom of Mokhaiotl levels 1-8 without ever letting a grub be absorbed.

combatAchievements.name: Doom Racer
combatAchievements.description: Defeat the Doom of Mokhaiotl levels 1-8 in less than 7:15.

combatAchievements.name: The Praying Mantis
combatAchievements.description: Defeat the Doom of Mokhaiotl levels 1-8 without restoring your prayer points through any method.

combatAchievements.name: Perfect Doom
combatAchievements.description: Defeat the Doom of Mokhaiotl levels 1-8 without taking any damage from the boss, letting any grubs be absorbed, or stepping in acid blood.

combatAchievements.name: Duel of Mokhaiotl
combatAchievements.description: Defeat the Doom of Mokhaiotl levels 1-8 whilst only damaging the boss with one-handed melee attacks.

combatAchievements.name: Darkness Is Your Ally?
combatAchievements.description: Defeat the Doom of Mokhaiotl levels 1-8 without equipping a demonbane weapon.

combatAchievements.name: Mopping up
combatAchievements.description: Clear at least 8 acid splats in a single Volatile Earth special attack.
